title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5330.17 - Acceptance of sports wagers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5330.17 - Acceptance of sports wagers

State Regulations

No mobile sports wager shall be valid until such sports
wager is accepted at a server or other electronic equipment located at a
casino. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5330.17

Adopted

New

York State Register November 24, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 47, eff. 11/24/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
